channel.title: FireX Tip Site & Clan
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img520.imageshack.us/img520/4884/firexlogoha0.gif[/img] [i][size=15pt]The RS2 Tip Site & Clan[/size][/i][/center]
This topic is specially made for the clan, soon we will buy a domain instead of RS2Gods by the way. FireX is a new RS2 Clan run through God of Ikiliki and Fr33sc4p3/Thug-Life. Do you want to join? Please click [url=http://www.rs2gods.net/clan/index.php]here[/url] to visit our forums to post an application. Our clan has no requirements but you must apply. When you didn't apply you cannot see the clan part on our tip site forums.
[b][u][i]What type of clan events do we have?[/i][/u][/b] • P2p PK Events • F2p PK Events (Depends on how many F2p Players we get) • Fight Pits Events • Castle Wars Events • Pest Control Events • Drop Parties
Note: Do you know any more events? Feel free to suggest them on our Forums.
[b][i][u]Clan Rules[/u][/i][/b] [b]1.[/b] We [u]NEVER[/u] kill clan members on PK trips except if the member bsed us. - In castle wars events you may attack each other. - In fight pits events you may attack each other. [b]2.[/b] We do not sell anything on our forums. [b]3.[/b] We only have 1 Forum account. Do you have more RS accounts? Just tell us about it but don't create accounts on the forum for every single RS account. [b]4.[/b] We do not share forum accounts and RS accounts. [b]5.[/b] We do not post any pornographic (18+) materials on the forums. [b]6.[/b] We do not advertise own sites. One of our clan leaders or forum moderators must approve it. Also the site must be based on our site and may not be a community, so no private server sites or anything else.
[b][i][u]Other information[/u][/i][/b] [u][i]IRC[/i][/u] Server: Irc.motoko.dairc.eu/Irc.moparisthebest.com/Irc.moparisthebest.com Channel: #FireX
[i][u]Forums[/u][/i] www.rs2gods.net/clan [url=http://www.rs2gods.net/clan]Click here[/url]
[i][u]Clan Leaders[/u][/i] God of Ikiliki Fr33sc4p3/Thug-Life ZeroFreeze (Co-Leader)
[b]Pictures:[/b] Drop Party [IMG]http://i124.photobucket.com/albums/p25/God_of_Ikiliki/loot.png[/img]
[b]Castle Wars[/b] [IMG]http://i46.photobucket.com/albums/f104/Leaada/firex-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.photobucket.com/albums/f104/Leaada/cw.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.photobucket.com/albums/f104/Leaada/zdd.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.photobucket.com/albums/f104/Leaada/2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.photobucket.com/albums/f104/Leaada/1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.photobucket.com/albums/f104/Leaada/3.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.rs2gods.net/clan/events/k01.gif[/img] [img]http://www.rs2gods.net/clan/events/k02.gif[/img] [img]http://www.rs2gods.net/clan/events/k03.gif[/img] [img]http://www.rs2gods.net/clan/events/k04.gif[/img] [img]http://www.rs2gods.net/clan/events/zezima.gif[/img] [img]http://www.rs2gods.net/clan/events/zezima2.gif[/img]
